vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐκκρεμ-άννῡμι,
future -κρεμάσω, hang from or upon a thing, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II passive, like{ἐκκρέμαμαι}, hang on by, cling to, with genitive, τῶν τε ξυσκήνων ἤδη ἀπιόντων ἐκκρεμαννύμενοι [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.2 metaphorically, to be devoted to, Ἄρεος [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (middle) to hang upon (words), to consider something seriously listen
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(middle) to hang upon (words), to consider something seriously listen
mid., to hang upon a speaker, fondly listen to, be earnestly attentive, Lk. 19:48*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: estar suspendido, estar colgado, estar pendiente
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ngưỡng mộ; say mê nghe; chăm chỉ nghe. ἐκ (G1537) + κρεμάννυμι (G2910)
